level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-131, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-4001.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Expiration of subchapter: Section 907 of D.C. Law 3-131 (codified as former § 45-1597) provided that all subchapters of this chapter, except subchapter V, shall terminate on April 30, 1985.
